group_1.textLeft: ...Yuu. You've been acting really weird today, @you know that?

group_1.textRight: What an upright girl you are, Shii...
How do you figure you should @weigh out punishment?

group_1.textLeft: ...What's gotten into you?

group_1.textRight: People like me aren't lie detectors @or anything.
That's why we have to be careful.
Y'know, the whole "presumption of innocence" @thing.
It's impossible for us to go back in time, @or even know what someone's true feelings are.
You're different, though.
Your dreams let you experience the emotions @of victims and their abusers.
That makes you more justified than all of @those other judges who can't use magic...

group_1.textLeft: In some ways, perhaps.
Still, the scope of that justification
only extends to prosecuting people @based on those dreams.
I'm punishing the perpetrators @for my own reasons,
as I don't want to have nightmares @about them anymore.
You can't equate personal convenience @with justice...

group_1.textRight: Then why do you keep writing names on the list
when you know you're not even in the right?

group_1.textLeft: Because that's what you taught me.
You said that there's more to finding meaning @than that.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, but why didn't you make a wish
to make your nightmares disappear?
Is it because you think Magical Girls @are all pitiful or something?

group_1.textLeft: That is part of it, but...
Ever since I was born,
I've been able to understand the worries @and suffering of others,
and I'm scared of not being able @to do that anymore...

group_1.textRight: Har-har.
I have no worries or suffering. @Do I make you nervous, too?

group_1.textLeft: You're special.

group_1.textRight: Sounds like you're making excuses for @not getting rid of your nightmares, Shii.

group_1.textLeft: No I'm not...

group_1.textRight: I bet that every time you experience @something vicariously in your dreams,
you're taking the baton from that person.

group_1.narration: "By rejecting it, @you'd be rejecting them, too."
"Who will be forgotten @when your nightmares are over?"
"Who gets left behind @by your Happily Ever After?"
There are things @that I turn a blind eye to.
Are my feelings still mine alone?

group_1.textCenter: (The only proof I have is my love for Yuu.)

group_1.narration: In my dreams, I'm repeatedly attacked by her. @She's feared and hated by people I dream of.
Despite experiencing this over and over again,
my feelings have not been diminished @in the slightest.

group_1.textCenter: (This emotion is the one anchor I have...)

group_1.textRight: What an upright girl you are, Shii.
Only you can be the voice
for the unheard.
This isn't something that some random person @pinned on you.
You're a true-blue spokesperson for others,
not some prepackaged model stuffed with @whatever common sense was lying around.
It's not about anybody's convenience. @You tell it like it is on behalf of those who can't.

group_1.textLeft: I am also the type of person
who interprets others in whatever way @suits my narrative...

group_1.textRight: You're not, though?
You kill bad guys for the sake of justice. @That means you're on everyone's side?

group_1.textLeft: No... Killing bad people isn't the correct thing @to do.
I'm the same as everyone else out there.
Nothing is different; I'm just as ugly as they are.

group_1.textRight: What are you talking about? @You're already a Magical Girl, y'know?
And, like, Magical Girls aren't human anymore?
They've got powers that defy human form @and logic, right?
Magical Girls make miracles happen
and change everything, yeah?
Don't they speak on behalf of the unseen?

group_1.textLeft: ...I'm not a Magical Girl yet.

group_1.textRight: Your life is just rolling on by.
Won't you wake up? Shii...
The world will change...
It's gonna happen, whether you want it to @or not.
All you have to do is notice...

group_1.textLeft: Notice...? Me...?

group_1.textRight: Well, yeah?
Take a good look at yourself...

group_1.textLeft: At...myself...?

group_1.textRight: Go on...

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhiteSlow1]...Ah...
